title: New Zilean passive info
body:
> Time In a Bottle
> 
> Zilean stores time as Experience at a rate of X per 5 seconds. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.

What are your thoughts on this, do you personally like the direction they are taking zilean in???

Source: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/bmEQpxmT-new-zilean-passive-q-feel-and-responsiveness-tuning-rec-item-pages-for-each-role

replies.body: EXP Quint's useful now? NO WAYS!
